title: How do I use my phone to navigate?
answer:
Your phone is fitted with a GPS receiver. To navigate with your phone, you simply need to install a navigation app. If your phone has no preloaded navigation apps, it is recommended that you log in to Play Store and download one. 

 When navigating with your phone, turn on the GPS before opening the navigation app. You can then follow instructions within the app to browse maps and plan routes.
